title: Who wrote the song 'It's Only Rock 'n Roll'? - Quora

response.answer_text: In his biography Keith Richards confess a true admiration for this song and recognize that Mick came to see him with the song. Keith says that he found the lyrics awsome "It's only rock n'roll and I like it". By the way I have dedicated a pearltree to Mick Jagger's portaits, if you like him : http://pear.ly/8gP

In Keith's book, I believe he also says that Ronnie Wood contributed to the writing but agreed with Jagger that he would give up his credit on this song in exchange for having the solo writing credit for 'I Can Feel the Fire', a song co-written with Jagger that appeared on Wood's first solo album.
